title: Dying Light 2 is fun. Its story? Not so much. #shorts

transcript_chunks.text: kind of funny recommends dying light 2 but you should know what you're getting into an open world rpg from developer techland dying light 2 is all about the journey and not about the lackluster destination for more than 20 hours i've been treated to some of the best parkour and video games and dying light 2 is fun to play but equally important its systems are engaging throughout like dozens of other open world games i'm looking at you ubisoft dying like two has me taking over structures for a better view of the map but techland makes each of these encounters a puzzle when i'd show up to take over a windmill i didn't know if it would take me two seconds or five minutes to figure out how to scale the beast the gameplay of dying light 2 never bored me the story well it fails miserably at that objective dying light 2 prides itself on choices the trouble is those choices are rarely impactful thanks to a narrative where i struggle to remember character names toss in a healthy amount of bugs

objective dying light 2 prides itself on choices the trouble is those choices are rarely impactful thanks to a narrative where i struggle to remember character names toss in a healthy amount of bugs in a nonsense ending and even rosario dawson's great performance can't make this tale memorable however just like your favorite 80s zombie film dying light 2's fun outweighs its funk check out our full review on the kind of funny games cast right now but in a nutshell
